interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.UserInterfaceSettings.TimeDisplay
interface.description: Interface to determine/control time display format on devices local user interface

property.name: DisplayTimeFormat
property.description: Format clock is currently using to display time (0=12-hour, 1=24-hour)

property.name: SupportedDisplayTimeFormats
property.description: Which time formats clock can support
